title: 14 day suspension  ban , I don't think is fair
body:
I'm here to ask if there is anyway you can contest your suspension , beacuse I feel like this automatic feedback is kinda bullshit .
I m aware that i've been punished with a chat restriction in the past and I guess that was fair , but not now , especially when I've tried so hard to be nice and fixing my " toxic" behavior for so long grinding honor and getting back my lvls ( with no success ).
On the riot support there isn't any ticket u can issue to ask for a suspension appeal , there is only " I have a question" well I don't have a question I'm asking for an appeal beacuse the punishment is not fair to me and mabye for lots of you , so i'll post the ticket I've opened and also the chat log with also i got punish for .

I'll open another ticket beacuse the last answer I got was pointless and I think i need to keep push forwards about this , beacuse my punishment which also means i'll get revoked all end season rewards is not fair and is not legit. 
so I'll retype this : 
I'm sorry but this is totally bullshit, i've been fixing my behavior and my last ticket was asking after 2months of getting honor how long was going to take before having back my honor lvls beacuse i was getting kind frustrated being nice and such getting honors all day and getting nothing out of it just getting flamed and insulted instead , now this; u suspended my account for this log .1 game just typing "%%%"that's all i typed in that game. FIRST OF ALL %%% could be mean plenty of things SECOND I didn't insult, I didn't have any toxic behavior of any kind and the only chat log i got punish for is clear I only typed "%%%" and good bye , thats all i typed in that game so I think u should revert this and fix the automatic feedback beacuse like if u are going to suspend me 2 weeks for this after trying to be nice for the last 2 months and hoping to get honor back plus this means i cant get the end season reward which i sweat and spit blood for these last months , then u get scrubs all day that flame insult are still there with honor 5 , like be serious? I 'd actually expect this suspension to get deleted beacuse this honestly is the most stupid uinfair thing I've ever seen. 
I have nothing to say but " nice chat log suspension riot". 
I hope u can revert the situation beacuse this is amazingly stupid. 
With this system i could simply play with all premade person and report the first guy typed something weird , he get automatic punished , thats just stupid , and thats what happened beacuse yes i got report for no reason ( beacuse i typed %%% ) from 3premade man . 
So once again I expect a fix for my account suspension beacuse this is beyond stupid. 

Speaking of what %%% could mean i would also attach this , got from an English Dictionary , so yes that's the worst stupid chat log punishment i've ever seen i'd like if u take care of it and might fix the situation beacuse like i said this is beyond stupid , and by the way those 2 definitions are only 2 out of plenty i've found.

replies.body:
You used **hate speech**. A word that is hate speech has become, generally over decades if not centuries, unacceptable for public usage.

There is **no** acceptable use for hate speech in League of Legends. Riot has a zero tolerance policy for those who choose to use hate speech. The reason for said policy is that there is **no** acceptable use for that word in League. Not talking about yourself, not talking about others, not talking about the game, not quoting someone... **NO** acceptable use.

Take this as a warning going forward that Riot does not tolerate any form of hate speech in the game.
Honestly, you could copy+paste this into literally every thread in Player Behavior, and it would be relevant 80% of the time.

I specifically try not to copy paste (even though it may sound like it since I'm saying the same thing over and over sometimes it seems), just because it seems like it's not putting in the effort these people deserve.

But yes, your point on a lot of people being confused that certain things are absolutely not tolerated on the boards or in game is correct.

I didn't call anyone that way u clearly didn't read all the post , and by the way open an English Dictionary and read how many meanings that word has.
I didn't say you are a *** or what *** , plus literally 3 lines chat log of ONLY ONE CHAT LOG after 3 months of reforming , you think 14 day suspension is fair ? LOL

> [{quoted}](name=Rhaast NeRo,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xHJwzA8Q,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-11T10:57:03.357+0000)
>
> I didn't call anyone that way u clearly didn't read all the post , and by the way open an English Dictionary and read how many meanings that word has.

You can't play that card, you knew what meaning you were using.

Then tell us why you said it multiple times then? followed by goodbye as if you were talking to someone.

I'd love to hear this.

> [{quoted}](name=Rhaast NeRo,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xHJwzA8Q,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-11T10:57:03.357+0000)
>
> I didn't call anyone that way u clearly didn't read all the post , and by the way open an English Dictionary and read how many meanings that word has.

What in gods green earth would you be calling a bundle of sticks or a cigarette?

Do you know that having a feedback that works in this way , I could premade a full team and the first sketchy word i read i could make send 5 reports and that person would get insta punished mabye unfairly? 
Beacuse this is basically what happened.

That's not how the system works at all. Each and every report is verified by the system, and if the player did nothing wrong, they will not be punished. Further, reports do not operate in an additive manner - one report carries the exact same weight as 9 reports does.
In what context would you use that hate speech in league? What purpose did those lines actually have? No one uses that language as an expletive to express frustration like shit or fuck.

If Riot felt the need to punish you for using hate speech, there is no way out of it. Not by submitting a ticket and not by posting about it on the boards. If they feel the punishment was valid, it will very likely not be revoked just because you think it's "bullshit". It's a video game, it's meant to be fun - ranked or not. If you can't help the toxic behavior and don't want to quit the game, at least mute all your team mates before the game begins. It's really not that hard to avoid a ban in this game.
Fuck off with the idea that it could have meant plenty of things. You know damn well what you said.

You deserve the suspension. You know its a slur, and trying to hide behind outdated meanings of the word is just pathetic. The rewards are bye bye for that account but in theory you COULD level a new account to 30 and get gold.

First one of Hate Speech isn't tolerate by riot at all, as they have confirmed...multiple times.

Also, it take a LOT and a long ass time for your punishment tiers to actually go down.


To expect to win if you contested your suspension isn't the best idea.(if you could contest it)

It has been made clear over and over again that using ANY hate speech will be an IMMEDIATE 14 day ban.  And yet you used it anyways and then literally went double with it with "Double &&&"

And don't go crying with it "It can mean many things" cause that's not gonna fly.  So don't act like you were using the original medieval period version of it when it used to mean bundles of firewood.

Ban deserved.
Maybe he said it to indicate he was smoking a cigarette, and the double was he was smoking 2. He was warning his team so they wouldn't team fight during it.

> [{quoted}](name=Weinereater,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xHJwzA8Q,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2017-10-11T11:11:38.730+0000)
>
> Maybe he said it to indicate he was smoking a cigarette, and the double was he was smoking 2. He was warning his team so they wouldn't team fight during it.

I like that reading of the scenario from your point of view , but that's only 1 you could find 1000 ways to describe that chat log ,thats the point if everyone goes immediatly to the conclusion i was insulting someone and is not always the case
goodbye was meant  beacuse I died lol , %%% was nothing to do with the enemy teamate or trying to insult anybody , thats the whole point i'm trying to make.

Hatespeech.

Zero Tolerance.

If you think it isnt fair, you shouldnt have accepted the ToS.
Lol. U got smited. Learn to keep ur mouth shut. Turn off all chat. Make chat screen text small. You knew exactly what u were saying when u typed it. Its a justifiable ban.
You called some a "%%%" dude do you really think that's unfair?

I had 2 years stop beacuse I was bored of the game mostly of the comunity  I went back to play the game this summer and all this happened , My account is still not perma banned , I got diamond 4 back in less then 3 months unfortunatly with this punishment is pointless since i ll not get any endseason reward plus the honor lvl 0 will stay forever that way beacuse after 3 months of getting hundres of honors it was still 0 , so no rewards no honors , nothing , my account might get back in 2 weeks but I guess im not gonna play it anymore beacuse all of this is just a big worthless pile of shit

Opening up multiple tickets does not help. 3 months is not long enough, and use of any hate speech, regardless of your version of events, is considered an escalated punishment.

Face facts, you messed up. Accept the consequences to your actions and move on. Maybe even try learning from it.

> [{quoted}](name=Rhaast NeRo,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xHJwzA8Q,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-10-11T11:03:45.469+0000)
>
> so you are telling me that out of ONLY 1 CHAT LOG OF 3 LINES which are not even insults , but even if they are u think you should get a 14  day suspension? 
> have u ready any other chatlogs? LOL

It's their biggest issue in their no tolerance policy. It escalates a punishment instantly. 

Perhaps you should have educated yourself better on their chat policy.

so you are telling me that out of ONLY 1 CHAT LOG OF 3 LINES which are not even insults , but even if they are u think you should get a 14  day suspension? 
have u ready any other chatlogs? LOL

Yep. This system is a joke. They will hand out 14 day instant bans for typing %%% yet give people a chat restiction for threating to kill and doxx people. Looking at the chat logs of the real toxic players who only recieve chat restrictions and comparing them to this highlights just how stupid this instant feedback system is. Calling something as tame as typing '%%%' once hatespeech when it has become a generic internet slur is quite frankly pathetic. The system is fucked.
